name: Docker Compose - Prometheus + Grafana
description: Prometheus と Grafana の簡易スタック。

files.template:
version: '3.9'
services:
  prom:
    image: prom/prometheus:latest
    volumes: ['./prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml']
    ports: ['9090:9090']
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:10.4.0
    ports: ['3000:3000']
    depends_on: [prom]
